node.title: Sony Music Entertainment Japan Teases VEE Project’s Dev-c Generation
node.description: Dev-c is composed of talents Aomiya Yozuri, Uriyone, Uparu, Luminous Amaama, and TwiCoto. Catch their debut on August 26, 2022.

node.title: VEE Project’s Shindouji Ako Officially Retires
node.description: Shindouji Ako, a VTuber that is part of Sony Music Entertainment Japan’s VEE Project, has retired from her official VTuber activities, a month after she debuted.
